segments.text: Oh my, this kitchen is quite the sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see water overflowing from the sink, and that woman is just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused on her task, completely unaware of the water at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit concerning to see the water just pouring out like that, but I'm sure she'll notice soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, trying to get cookies from the jar, are quite the little climbers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really going out on a limb to get those cookies, I hope he's careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, it's quite sweet really.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm sure everything will turn out fine, it's just a bit of a mess right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks lovely, it's a nice contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm sure the woman will have everything under control soon enough.
segments.speaker: PAR
